reference: Basar, T., A Tutorial on Dynamic and Differential Games, paper presented at 7th Annual Conference on Economic Dynamics and Control, London, June 1985.

Carlozzi, N. and J. B. Taylor, International Capital Mobility and the Coordination of Monetary Rules, in J. Bhandari (ed.) Exchange Rate Management under Uncertainty, MIT Press, Cambridge, Mass., 1985.

Currie, D. and P. Levine, Macroeconomic Policy Design in an Interdependent World, in W. H. Buiter and R. C. Marston (eds.) International Economic Policy Coordination, Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, U.K., 1985.
